metadata.title: CVE-2018-5119 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
The reader view will display cross-origin content when CORS headers are setto prohibit the loading of cross-origin content by a site. This could allowaccess to content that should be restricted in reader view. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 58.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-5119` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 58.0+build6-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-globalmenu - 58.0+build6-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 58.0+build6-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-testsuite - 58.0+build6-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '58.0+build6-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
